meanings.definition: Checked again for accuracy or correctness.
meanings.sent1: I rechecked my homework to make sure I didn't make any mistakes.
meanings.sent2: She rechecked the recipe to ensure she added the right ingredients.
meanings.sent3: The detective rechecked the crime scene for any missed clues.
meanings.sent4: After the storm, the farmer rechecked his crops to assess the damage.
meanings.sent5: Before submitting the report, I rechecked all the data for errors.

meanings.sent1: He rechecked the document to find the missing information.
meanings.sent2: The teacher rechecked the students' work to provide feedback.
meanings.sent3: The mechanic rechecked the car's engine to ensure it was fixed properly.
meanings.sent4: The scientist rechecked the experiment to confirm the results.
meanings.sent5: Before the flight, the pilot rechecked the safety procedures.
